item.title: New Container: Sickgear
item.description: We have released a new container for Sickgear! SickGear provides management of TV shows and/or Anime, it detects new episodes, links downloader apps, and more.. For more information on SickGear visit their website and check it out: https://github.com/SickGear/SickGear
item.content:
We have released a new container for Sickgear!

SickGear provides management of TV shows and/or Anime, it detects new episodes, links downloader apps, and more..

For more information on SickGear visit their website and check it out: https://github.com/SickGear/SickGear
